hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path | select(endswith(".py"))' | xargs -r uv tool run ruff format >&2 || { [ $? -eq 1 ] && exit 2; }
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path | select(endswith(".py"))' | xargs -r uv tool run ruff check --fix >&2 || { [ $? -eq 1 ] && exit 2; }
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path | select(endswith(".py"))' | xargs -r uv run mypy --strict >&2 || { [ $? -eq 1 ] && exit 2; }
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path | select(endswith(".ts") or endswith(".tsx"))' | xargs -r sh -c 'cd app && pnpm run build:relay >&2' || { [ $? -eq 1 ] && exit 2; }
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path | select(endswith(".ts") or endswith(".tsx"))' | xargs -r sh -c 'cd app && pnpm run fmt -- "$@" >&2' _ || { [ $? -eq 1 ] && exit 2; }
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path | select(endswith(".ts") or endswith(".tsx"))' | xargs -r sh -c 'cd app && pnpm run lint:fix >&2' _ || { [ $? -eq 1 ] && exit 2; }
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path | select(endswith(".ts") or endswith(".tsx"))' | xargs -r sh -c 'cd app && pnpm run typecheck >&2' || { [ $? -eq 1 ] && exit 2; }
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path | select(contains("src/phoenix/db/migrations/versions"))' | xargs -r sh -c 'tox run -e ddl_extract >&2' || { [ $? -eq 1 ] && exit 2; }
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path | select(endswith("pyproject.toml") or endswith("uv.lock"))' | xargs -r sh -c 'uv sync >&2' || { [ $? -eq 1 ] && exit 2; }
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path | select(contains("schemas/openapi.json"))' | xargs -r sh -c 'cd js && { pnpm i && pnpm build; } >&2' || { [ $? -eq 1 ] && exit 2; }
